Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, i'm Ben I am from England i just this game yesterday after watching people for weeks playing it. After many attempts to get a perfect orbit i finally did it 100,000m orbit (almost)

just out of curiosity if i got a picture i want to show in a thread how do i go about doing it?

Thanks

Ben

Hey.

There's a fred for pictures. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24533-Show-off-your-awesome-KSP-pictures!

The first post there gives a brief "how to".

Happy detonations,

Kia.
For some reason i can not print the screen when i do it print screens my dashboard...
If you press f1 on your keyboard it should send what's on your ksp window at that instance to the screenshots file in the ksp folder, you can then retrieve the picture from there.
But you will need to post 3 more times (up to the requirement of 5) before the forum gives you permission to post pics and do some other things.
